param.para: A pointer to a structure that receives a description of the query.

summary.para: Represents a query object for querying information from the graphics processing unit (GPU).

remarks.para: A query can be created with .

Query data is typically gathered by issuing an command, issuing some graphics commands, issuing an command, and then calling to get data about what happened in between the Begin and End calls. The data returned by GetData will be different depending on the type of query.
There are, however, some queries that do not require calls to . For a list of possible queries see .
When using a query that does not require a call to , it still requires a call to . The call to End causes the data returned by to be accurate up until the last call to End.
